article_title: Thousands attend Hamas deputy leader's funeral in Beirut
sentence: Thousands  of  people  have  attended  the  funeral  in  Beirut  of  Saleh  al-Arouri,  the  top  Hamas  leader  assassinated  in  a  suspected  Israeli  attack  in  the  Lebanese  capital  two  days  ago.

sentence: Who  was  the  Hamas  leader  killed  in  Beirut?
